body.name: LED Desk Lamp Table Lamp Reading Lamp with USB Charging Port 5 Lighting Modes 5 Brightness Levels, Sensitive Control, 30 min Auto Timer, Eye-Caring Office Lamp 13W
body.stockDetail: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.

features: ✨Multiple Lighting Choices:This led desktop lamp offers 5 lighting modes that can each be paired with one of the 5 brightness levels for a total of 25 different light settings. to accommodate the lighting environment needed for a variety of activities such as reading, crafting, and studying.

✨Auto-Timing & Memory Function:The table lamp has a 30-minute timer switch function, we recommend that you turn on when reading or office use, it is best to rest after 30 minutes of energy concentration, the light off can remind you to relax your eyes.The built-in memory function restores the color temperature and brightness level before use when it is turned on again

✨Night Light& Adjustable Angle:The special night light setting helps you sleep and emits a low color temperature light of 2200K when turned on。Flexible to bend the main body of the lamp and the top light bar. You can focus the light exactly where you need it.

✨Eye-Friendly Non-Flickering Light: Desk lamp provides soft, strobe-free light, reducing the blue light emitted by LED lights, effectively avoiding visual fatigue caused by glare when reading a book or screen, helping you experience comfort during long hours of use.

✨Energy Saving LED Lamp :Reduce the electricity bill by 75% Up to 50000hrs Lifespan and do not overheat like other traditional lights. Keep your workspace cool and comfortable.In addition, If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: PERFINE Desk Lamps for Various Activities LED desk lamps help reduce the contrast between the object you are focused on and the surrounding area, for working, studying, reading, or relaxing, also it diffuses a uniform, soft and flicker-free light that won't fatigue your eyes even after long hours of use. Input voltage (V): 5V1-2A Color rendering index: CRI>85% Lamp beads: 24pcs white light, 24pcs warm light Color temperature: white light, warm light, natural light Material: Aluminum & Iron & Plastic Illumination: 500 LUX Luminous flux: 300 lm Light body weight: 650g

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LED desk lamp, customize the ideal lighting to illuminate your space. Desk lamps are used every day for reading, studying and working, so we recommend an energy-efficient LED desk lamp that's great for your eyes. This LED desk lamp can be used for a wide range of purposes, including study, precision work and break time. It is also recommended for telecommuters, remote workers and others who are looking for a stand lamp that is easy on the eyes

Features： "Notice" Do not allow children to look directly at the light source; not battery powered, must be connected to the power supply;. Use the provided USB-C charging cable, Does not include Adapter Plug, which must be purchased separately Use a power adapter of at least 5V/1-2A Features Eye protection light, 5 color temperature modes, 5 brightness adjustments, high color rendering, memory function, energy saving, low heat generation. Touch sensor dimming, including USB port, night light function, 30 minutes timer, multi-angle adjustment, long life 50,000 hours.

What will you get? 1* LED Desk Lamp 1*Charging line 1*Lamp usage manual PERFINE Desk Lamps for Various Activities LED desk lamps help reduce the contrast between the object you are focused on and the surrounding area, for working, studying, reading, or relaxing, also it diffuses a uniform, soft and flicker-free light that won't fatigue your eyes even after long hours of use. Input voltage (V): 5V1-2A Color rendering index: CRI>85% Lamp beads: 24pcs white light, 24pcs warm light Color temperature: white light, warm light, natural light Material: Aluminum & Iron & Plastic Illumination: 500 LUX Luminous flux: 300 lm Light body weight: 650g

Eye protection table lamp LED desk lamps are gentle on the eyes, without multiple shadows and without glare. Provides a natural tone of light that is indistinguishable from natural light. The even brightness of the work surface means that your eyes won't get tired even after long hours of studying, and the 500 lumens make it perfect for work and study! Eye Caring & No Flicker In the light, there will be no flicker phenomenon and will also protect your eyes very well. There will also be no buzzing noise that will disturb you. CRI >85, More Vivid CRI is one of the important indicators of LED lights. If the CRI < 80, the human skin tone will appear dark and dull under the light. The eyes will also feel discomfort when used for too long

Energy Efficient LED lamp Under the same circumstances than the incandescent lamp energy saving 75%, can save a large amount of electricity, life expectancy of up to 50,000 hours. Adjustable light arm The lamp arm can be adjusted by 220°, 270° rotatable lamp head°, and oints rotary by 80°.flexible adjustment of lighting angle. Smart memory function Automatically restores the color temperature and brightness to the last time it was turned off when it is turned on again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Poca luz de lectura
reviews.reviewText: El diseño es muy agradable, funcional y práctico.Lo que se podría mejorar es la capacidad de iluminación (más lúmenes para mayor nitidez de lectura) ya que esa fué la razón por la que la compré.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect lamp for my new desk set up. Love the flexibility and the many positions that this lamp can be put in. Variable brightness and lighting modes as well as a timer. Great lamp for a very reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for the small space I have available on my desk. I like the extra usb ports on it for charging my phone. It will also adjust to different types of light, dim, bright, soft. Great compact light!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile lamp, good quality, easily portable
reviews.reviewText: This lamp has become difficult to find in our home because everybody seems to have a use for it. The compact size and ability to fold into a small size (for a lamp) mean that my daughter can fold it up and put it in her laptop case for use at the library. The carrels there are not well-lit, so she takes this lamp and plugs the USB A to USB C cable into her power bank and can use it for hours on end. There is also a USB A outlet receptacle so she can charge her phone and iPad also. The light does not strobe or flicker, it's very even and great for reading. There was a comment about only being able to use the USB C cable that it came with, but we've not had that issue. We use generic USB A to USB C cords with no problem.I use this lamp for sewing at night and really like the selectable color temperature and brightness. I sew for community projects and it's often late at night when I get around to this. I select a warmer color temperature and a mid-level brightness that doesn't hurt my eyes. And taking a move from my daughter, I plug this into a power bank so I can use it and sew anywhere my heart desires.Hubs uses this outside on a table by our grill. It's not lit very well at night, but he cranks up the brightness and white color temperature -- it really lights up the grill and surrounding.We didn't expect this light to be so versatile and hadn't thought about how handy it would be to power it from a modest size power bank. But now that we've experienced how easy it is to put light wherever we want it, and to easily fold and transport it, there's no going back. We'll be looking for these features in the next lamp we get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Quality is not good
reviews.reviewText: After 1 month of use, the light will randomly change brightness and night light will randomly turn on by itself. I think it is the buttonless control or my house is haunted. Light is also very dim, hard to see

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Versatile design but not very bright
reviews.reviewText: This lamp design is versatile as you are able to rotate adjust the light bar, rotate and angle adjust the light support bar and control the light temperature and its brightness. The lamp electricity input is driven by a provided cable (USB-A to USB-C) which is plugged into the USB-C port at the back. The cable can then be plugged into any USB-A port charger, or to the USB-A port at the back of your computer if nearby. I find that it would work with any USB-A charger, but somehow it only works with the provided cable and not just any USB-A to USB-C cable. Also available near the electricity input port is a USB-A port which you can use to charge your phone or any external device. Turning the lamp on/off is via touch at the base. Also, you can adjust the light brightness by sliding your finder on the light brightness gradient on the base (from low to high). Light temperature adjustment is available with 5 different light temperature, from warm to white. A timer function is also available to auto turn off the lamp after 30 min. A night light function also is available by turning on the soft light source at the base of the lamp.Although with such versatile design with the lamp, I am disappointed with the intensity of the light even at max level. This lamp will work if used to light up a small area, but with a large desktop it will not do the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great desk lamp
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp is pretty cool. It has a lot of features and doesn't do anything overly great. It works and gives off light but I'm not sure it'll hold up long term. In fairness, it has been really nice reading at the desk. The night light really doesn't do much and probably isn't needed but the versatility of the reading light is pretty cool, although still only being used for light on my desk surface. If you need a desk lamp, sleek and functional.
